fulltext:
hello!
GRAPHIC DESIGNER & UI/UX DESIGNERS
SKILLS
PHOTOSHOP ILLUSTRATOR INDESIGN
Basic knowledge: HTML, CSS, Javascript,
Dreamweaver, Premiere, After Effect, 
3Ds Max, Maya
ABOUT ME
I love researching, discovering new things, playing around with illustrator 
and design. I am a reserved but ambitious young professional seeking a 
career that fits my professional skills and personality.
Having good excellent education, and phenomenal mathematical faculty 
have allowed me to advance the prospects of industrial design.
LANGUAGES
JAPANESE ENGLISH VIETNAMESE

Studying new softwares to get experiences 
for UI/UX design and create videos.
2014–2015
Japanese School
Learning new language in one year.
2010–2013
Information Technology
Learning HTML, Java script, ... to create 
application and website
EXPERIENCE
Junior Web and Graphic Designer
2016-2018 
- Work for Vietlink Company
- Manage workflow and main design for the 
web design projects with the aid of the 
Project Manager and Product Manager.
Web designer
2015–2016
Communicate and coordinate with internal 
clients, graphic designers, outside vendors to 
ensure the success experience.
2014–2015 Designer
Consult with internal partners to determine 
visual requirements that support.
2012–2013
Assistant developer / programmer
Assistant developer and designer to create a 
website and application.
INTERESTS
I like to travel around the world, especially Japan. If I have a 
chance, I will live and work at there. Besides that, 
 I love listening to classical music and eating cake. 
THEATRE TRAVEL MUSIC READING
